definition: threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
Beijing Airport (PEK)/also translated as Capital Airport

pinyin: Shou3 du1 Guo2 ji4 Ji1 chang3
Ao4 men2 Guo2 ji4 Ji1 chang3

definition: Kai Tak Airport, international airport of Hong Kong from 1925 to 1998
Beijing Daxing International Airport (PKX), nicknamed 海星機場|海星机场[hai3 xing1 ji1 chang3] because its terminal looks like a huge starfish
Beijing Nanyuan Airport, military air base and secondary civil airport of Beijing
pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Nan2 yuan4 Ji1 chang3
Bei3 jing1 Da4 xing1 Guo2 ji4 Ji1 chang3

sentences.english: I let the plane down gently, pulled off the runway, and taxied back to parking.
sentences.chinese: 我稳稳地降落了飞机，驶离跑道，滑行回了停机场。
欢迎你们来到云林机场。

sentences.english: Passengers must check in at the airport one hour before plane leaves.
sentences.chinese: 乘客必须在飞机起飞前一小时到机场签票。

sentences.english: If there is a thunderstorm at the target airport, the flight can land to alternate airport .
sentences.chinese: 如果该机场为雷雨天气，飞机可以到备降机场降落。

sentences.english: If there is a thunderstorm at the target airport, the flight can land to alternate airport .
sentences.chinese: 如果该机场为雷雨天气，飞机可以到备降机场降落。

sentences.english: The aeroplane landed us at the airport in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 飞机把我们降落在巴塞罗那机场。

sentences.english: Riverside Hotel at Sea Island in the southern part of Davao, from the international airport two kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 海岛水边饭店位于达沃的南部，离国际机场2公里。

sentences.english: Beiling airport is used by Shenyang Aircraft Corporation for test flights.
sentences.chinese: 北陵机场是由沈阳飞机工业公司使用的飞行试验。

sentences.english: Attendees must pass through airport-like security.
sentences.chinese: 参加者必须通过机场式的安检。

sentences.english: Chinese Ambassador to Russia Li Hui also greeted Hu at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 中国驻俄罗斯大使李辉也到机场迎接。

sentences.english: Aerobatic flights over airfield up to 2000m.
sentences.chinese: 花样飞行在机场上空，高度2000米。

sentences.english: On Thursday only 168 flights passed through Gatwick.
sentences.chinese: 周四，只有168架航班通过盖特维克机场。

sentences.english: I'll be glad to drive you out to Narita when you go to L. A.
sentences.chinese: 你去洛杉矶的时候，我很愿意开车送你去成田机场。

sentences.english: The magnetic-levitation train ride from the international airport to the city is the perfect metaphor for Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 从国际机场到市区的磁悬浮列车线是上海的最佳名片。

sentences.english: The only option left with me was to ask her to go the airport for getting her ticket re-scheduled.
sentences.chinese: 留给我的唯一选项就是叫她去机场重新预订机票。

sentences.english: Terminal 3 of the airport is the single largest building, by floor space.
sentences.chinese: 机场的3号航站楼按占地面积来说是最大的独立建筑。

definition: Beijing Airport (PEK)/also translated as Capital Airport

pinyin: Shou3 du1 Guo2 ji4 Ji1 chang3

definition: to get off a plane/to deplane
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
jointing machine/riveter/welder/sealer/to meet a plane (i.e. to meet sb at airport)/to service a plane (of airport workers)
